name: 鲁卡斯·福若斯特
name_full: 鲁卡斯·福若斯特 Lucas Frost
introduction: Lucas Frost made his way into adult when he began shooting content with his girlfriend, 2016 Best New Starlet nominee Cassidy Klein. And it's a career move that seems to suit him."My favorite thing about being in the industry is being in front of the camera and the different characters I get to play," said the tall Orange County resident.Since he's had the pleasure of working with Wicked Pictures and Digital Playground, Frost has gotten a chance to flex his acting muscles. And he's got a very particular idea for his dream scene: "I'd love to do a scene with Kendra Lust and Cassidy Klein for Tushy with Greg Lanksy."Frost keeps active when he's not in front of a camera, spending time outdoors, going to the gym, and socializing with friends and family.His words to live by show his determination to get ahead: "Don't be standard. Be the standard."
